name: Chunk Y Birb
description:
Chunk Y Birb is a 2-player couch party game where you have to dodge incoming meteorites while making it harder for the other player to do so.
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK jam.
All art and programming was made during the jam.

A game by:

Matei Adeodatus Ungureanu - Programming, Unity Setup  

https://mateiadeodatus.itch.io/

Mugur Colin - Modelling , FX Animation

https://www.therookies.co/mugur/entries

Theodor Colin - Animation, Rigging, UI, Level Design, Modelling

https://www.instagram.com/tedy_colin/

Big thanks for music:

Game Music by Oscar Owl            
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAXR2RYFWwUAFmX4NPgEZZg

Menu Music by izioq    
https://izioq.bandcamp.com/

DISCLAIMER!!

-YOU NEED A GAMEPAD TO JOIN AS PLAYER 2

KNOWN GMTK GAMEJAM BUILD GLITCHES/BUGS:

- RED / BLUE WIN SCREENS ARE INVERTED. WHOOPS
-"BACK TO MENU" BUTTON ON PAUSE SCREEN DOESN'T WORK
- CURSOR DISSAPEARS FOREVER AFTER YOU PRESS START GAME 

-THERE WILL BE A BUG-FREE BUILD AFTER THE GAME JAM ENDS

Bug free version ( Temporary ):

https://we.tl/t-UXbpmvGFLo

Thanks for playing!
